00017     : doprt(true), str(""), s(&str, QIODevice::WriteOnly)

00020 
00021 Log::~Log()
00022 {    
00023     if (doprt) {        
00024         s.flush(); // does nothing probably..
00025         QString theString = QString("[Thread ") + QString::number((unsigned long)QThread::currentThreadId()) + " "  + QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString("M/dd/yy hh:mm:ss.zzz") + "] " + str;
00026         while (theString.endsWith('\n') || theString.endsWith('\r')) theString = theString.left(theString.length()-1);
00027         if (emulApp()) {
00028             emulApp()->logLine(theString, color);
00029         } else {
00030             // just print to console for now..
00031             std::cerr << theString.toUtf8().constData() << "\n";
00032         }
00033     }
00034 }

00036 Debug::~Debug()
00037 {
00038     if (!emulApp() || !emulApp()->isDebugMode())
00039         doprt = false;
00040     color = Qt::darkBlue;
00041 }

00055 Status::Status(int to)
00056     : to(to), str(""), s(&str, QIODevice::WriteOnly)
00057 {
00058     s.setRealNumberNotation(QTextStream::FixedNotation);
00059     s.setRealNumberPrecision(2);
00060 }

00062 Status::~Status()
00063 {
00064     if (emulApp()) emulApp()->statusMsg(str, to);
00065     else {
00066         std::cerr << "STATUSMSG: " << str.toUtf8().constData() << "\n";
00067     }
00068 }
